name: Lana Demo
author: Lana Codes

sections.description:
Demo user with editable roles and dashboard widgets.

Role options:

  • upload files
  • edit posts
  • edit pages

You can add two dashboard widget.

Lana Codes

Lana Demo
sections.installation:
Requires

  • WordPress at least 4.0
  • PHP at least 5.3

Instalation steps

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/lana-demo directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

How to use it

  • in Settings > Lana Demo, you can set the demo username and password.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with Lana Demo?
Use these support channels appropriately.

Installation Instructions

  • PHP at least 5.3

Instalation steps

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/lana-demo directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

How to use it

  • in Settings > Lana Demo, you can set the demo username and password.

upgrade_notice.1.0.9: This version changed dashboard widgets and reformat code. Upgrade recommended.

upgrade_notice.1.0.6: This version fixes escape bug. Upgrade recommended.
upgrade_notice.1.0.5: This version fixes function prefix bug. Upgrade recommended.
upgrade_notice.1.0.4: Nothing has changed in this version. Tested in WordPress 4.7 and compatible.

upgrade_notice.1.0.1: This version fixes added_option filter. Upgrade recommended.
